summary:
I connect emerging brands with buyers, manifest product launches, and increase speed-to-market by connecting the right category buyers & Suppliers via our category-driven Programs, discovery campaigns, and curated solutions offered by RangeMe & ECRM.

Who am I?

"A true European Citizen at heart who has lived in Three European countries and nowadays call the Netherlands my Home''

I did BSc. In Mechatronic & Control Engineering and a Master’s in International Business with a specialization in International Business Strategy. I am a Senior Business Development / Client Success Manager with extensive international experience working with Pharma, FMCG, and CPG industries and I am passionate about building brands.

I am a team player, who is excited by innovations and creative ideas. I am motivated by utilizing my skills, knowledge, and my broad range of industry experience and putting it to “best practice”.

I take pride in building strong relationships with my clients and helping them to achieve the results they are looking for, which in return translates into a high renewal rate, increased loyalty, and referrals.

What you can expect from working with me is a fusion of creative, technical, and commercial expertise packaged up with energy and a passion to deliver results.

school.name: University of Engineering and Technology, Lahore

projects.title: FOREIGN DIRECT INVESTMENT & TECHNOLOGY TRANSFER
projects.description:
1.	The project report addresses the Inward FDI in manufacturing sector of Malaysia.
2.	As the Manufacturing sector is so wide spread so to keep my report bit point oriented, I have put more impressive on inward FDI in Electronics and component industry with in manufacturing sector. 
3.	Report flow from general Introduction of FDI in Malaysia to why Malaysia and benefits of Investment in Malaysia,  present situation in manufacturing sector and then general over view of Inward FDI in electronics and component industry and supporting industries, following the spill over on economy which Inward FDI in this sector has brought with it. 
4.	Conclusion covers the Future of Malaysian Manufacturing industry, defects and factors which government should attend to, to make economy better and followed by few suggestions.

projects.title: Recruitment and selection
projects.description: Recruitment and selection process is becoming more and more strategic with the increasing complexity of the jobs, skills and services. Choosing the right person out of the pool of the applicants is not easy task and it takes time to develop the new strategies and process to find the right person for the right job.

profile_positions.description:
ECRM has over 25 years of experience bringing efficiencies and effectiveness to the 
buying and selling process by connecting buyers and suppliers through key programs 
that merge digital and face-to-face platforms. We also fuel your business with insight 
and thought leadership that points forward to where the industry is going, so you can be 
a step ahead in an ever-changing landscape.

As International Client Success Manager for vendors, I am responsible for:

1. Building and maintaining relationships across a portfolio of customers attending ECRM Programs. 

2. Successfully prepare vendors prior to, during, and after ECRM Programs. Focused on educating clients on our marketing and preparation system and tools so they utilize ECRM as a year-round business process in an ever-changing industry. 

3. Review event protracks, benchmarks, and report cards on a timely basis to ensure I am on track for clients to have successful events.

4. Work closely with all teams/departments to ensure an open exchange of ideas, ongoing communication, and that all client’s needs are exceeded.

▪Attend ECRM events to observe, conduct interviews, gather suggestions for improvement, sell future events, and educate clients in the ECRM Business Process.

Additional Responsibilities:

▪Maintain expert knowledge of all aspects of ECRM’s web applications & software.

▪ Project lead within the Client success management team for rolling our retention/Renewal based business model 

▪ Project lead seller for the RangeMe Sourcing Campaigns for leading European retailers. 

▪Utilize,Zoom, ECRM Connect to instruct clients on how to fully utilize the ECRM tools and MarketGate to assist them in their merchandising process.

▪Review Post Event surveys to ensure client satisfaction and address any issues immediately.

#client success managment #project management #events #product discovery #account managment #customer relationship managment #software as a service (Saar) #prodcut discovery platform
profile_positions.title: Client Success Manager - International

profile_positions.description:
As Senior sales manager, I am responsible for :

1. Building consultative partnerships with small, and medium Manufacturers/Distributors in the Food, Health, Beauty, Personal care, Pet, and General Merchandise categories to determine needs and increase distribution to new markets via Retail/ Distribution channels both domestically and internationally. 
2. Providing an atmosphere for strategic 1 on 1 meetings to help Mfg/Distributors to increase market share and meet with medium-large retailers to propel their companies as well as private brands to new heights.
3. Introduce the ECRM business process for category-specific planning sessions to new and existing clients to assist manufacturers to win new business. 
4. Attend competitive trade events to generate new leads and educate manufacturers/distributors on ECRM's business process
5. Mentoring new starters in the business development Unit.
6. Working closely with the VP international to develop strategies for expanding ECRM business in Europe.
profile_positions.title: International Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
UBM is the global leader in business media, connecting people and organizations through trusted brands and services. 

As an account manager, I am responsible for over 250 Key accounts within UBM Pharma portfolio. 
My Main Responsibilities are : 

1. Managing relationships with over 250 Key accounts as the main point of contact.
2. Delivery of assigned Sales campaigns, against accounts, products, and revenue targets 
3. Development of brand and industry-specific knowledge, including competitor events, to enhance and improve new business sales performance 
4. Develop Sales Strategy and approaches to grow existing customer account share of wallet, through the cross and up-selling 
5. Manage the handing over of Sale information and customer requirements (via Salesforce) to the Event Operations and Brand teams 
6. Zone owner for three zones, managing daily activities within those zones. 
7. Managing local teams and Floor plans for our Flagship event ( CPHI World Wide )
8. Zone manager in our flagship event, managing the Fine Chemical and Custom manufacturing Zones

Key Achievement:
1. Brought in  2 Million for our flagship show by selling/cross-selling.
2. Overachieving my target by 88 percent.
3. Part of the Sales Team of the year. It was an award to recognize us for achieving our targets and successfully managing our relationship with our clients.


CPhI Worldwide is the leading event for the global Pharmaceutical Ingredients Industry. Every year, 36,000 buyers, manufacturers, suppliers, and users attend CPhI Worldwide in Europe to exchange ideas, form alliances, and conduct business on an International scale. More than 2,200 exhibitors represent all aspects of the ingredients market including APIs, Fine chemicals, biopharmaceuticals, excipients/formulations, intermediates, generic APIs, finished dosage, custom manufacturing, and more. CPhI drives Pharma Ingredient markets in key regions with events in Russia, Japan, China, Korea, India, Istanbul, and Southeast Asia.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
1. I was responsible for the end-to-end recruitment process, always ensuring a positive candidate experience.  I was mainly recruiting customer service agents( 10 different languages), guest reviews, credit control, and account executives. 
2. During this process I screened cv's, conduct a high volume of telephone interviews, and run assessment centers as well as maintained the recruitment database and reports. 
3. In addition to that I manage the recruitment administration involved, including offer processing.

Key Achievement:
1. Hired 15 professionals within a record time of two weeks to close the open positions.
profile_positions.title: Interim Corporate Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
Antal International is a global executive recruitment organization with over 130 offices in 35 countries. Antal International's Group has a track record of many tens of thousands of placements in over 75 countries worldwide and over 20 years of experience in recruiting talent for corporate clients.

As an executive search specialist and I set up the recruitment desk from scratch for Risk, Credit control, actuarial, and Compliance positions for the Banking, Insurance & Financial Institutions sector in the Benelux region.  

1. I successfully managed the 360-degree Recruitment process
2. Building up a new recruitment desk from scratch in Risk Management. 
3. Generated new business by developing a solid relationship with key stakeholders within the financial sector. 
4.  Posting job advertisements on various job boards
5. Sourcing the right candidates by using various job boards and LinkedIn
6.  Facilitated clients in the Initial screening of candidates
7. Contract negotiation
8. Follow up with the client and candidate after placement 
9. Working with Big 4 and a few other big names within the financial industry.

Key Achievement:
1.  I hired a Vice president in Risk sector for a leading Bank in Luxembourg and helped him relocate from London.
2.  Hired head of Credit control for a leading European bank and relocated him from Hungary.
3. Worked with one of the Big four and helped them hire people with a background in Actuarial science.
profile_positions.title: Executive Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.location: THE ALEXANDER SUITE SILK POINT , QUEENS AVENU, SK10 2BB Macclesfield, UK
profile_positions.description:
As manager of international business, I was involved in several local projects and two international projects. My main Duties were:

1. New business development and strengthening relationships with present clients
2. I provided business services (e.g. Business development, business consulting, business strategy, HR solutions, sales, and marketing strategy, Recruitment, representation, and profile management) online and in person for national and international clients
3. Project management
4. Along with local projects, I successfully executed two foreign projects over client sites in Denmark and Pakistan 

Along with local projects, I successfully executed two foreign projects over client sites in Denmark and Pakistan.  

1. Regional Business Development and business restructuring, Manolo Gelato, Helsingør, Denmark
    Successfully generated over half a million DKK for the chain in that region by acquiring a new business with local restaurants, hotels, and schools. Planned, arranged, and monitored various marketing strategies and events to acquire the local market by increasing the loyalty of old customers and attracting new customers. Restructured the hiring process and implemented strategies to motivate staff. 

Key Achievement:
I.  70% increase in business within one season generating extra revenue of 1 Million DKK 
II. Decreased waste, reducing operation costs by 10 percent. 

2. Regional Business Development, CogSoul Soft, Lahore, Pakistan
    Identified potential clients and the decision-makers within the client organizations. Closed business deals by coordinating requirements; developing and negotiating contracts; integrating contract requirements with business operations. Developed a rapport with new/Existing clients and provide the support that will continually improve the relationship. Restructured and implemented new methodologies for hiring and training sales staff.

Key Achievement:
I. Generated 2 million PKR worth of New business.
